actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain corporations under Alaska the Native Claims Settlement Act to merge or consolidate.

summary.text: Authorizes the merger or consolidation of village corporations formed within the same region of Alaska under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act. Permits the subsequent merger of any such merged corporations with other such merged corporations within the same region. States that such mergers shall be on mergers voted on by shareholders either before or after this Act's enactment. States that the merged corporation would be entitled to all rights and benefits of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act and shall be subject to all the restrictions and obligations of such Act. Permits the elimination, under specified circumstances, of the extra rights given to nonvillage residents as part of the terms of a merger or consolidation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain corporations under Alaska the Native Claims Settlement Act to merge or consolidate.
